emailAddress.errorMessage: Your email address must be in the format: name@example.com

password.title: Password
password.errorMessage: Your password must be at least 6 characters long. No special characters are permitted (!,@,#,$,_,%, .. etc).

newsletterSubscription.title: I'd like to receive Payza's monthly newsletter and the latest info on promotions, services, and tips.

agreement.title: By clicking Get started, you agree to our User Agreement and that you are 18 years of age and over.

weHaveSent.title: We've sent a "Welcome to Payza"email to:

toConfirmThat.title: To confirm that this is your email address, click on the validation link in the email we've sent you.

whySould.title: Why should I complete my profile setup?

youWill.title: You'll be able to load your Payza Wallet, and send and receive funds.

itShould.title: It only takes a few moments. Plus, you can save at any point and finish later.

postalCode.title: Postal code
postalCode.errorMessage: The Postal Code can only contain digits or letters.

notificationAboutEmailValidation.title: Before you can send and receive funds, you need to validate your email address:

youCanReset.title: You can reset your password by answering a recover question.

asASecurityMeasure.title: As a security measure, one way that we verify your identity is by your date of birth.

increaseTheSecurity.title: Increase the security of your money transfers by creating a 4-8 digit transaction PIN.

onceYouComplete.title:
Once you complete profile setup you can access your account's basic functions.

Follow this up by verifying your account to lift its transaction limits.

You can save your progress, and pick up where you left off, at any time.
